# Aura of Cold, Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** 5 ft.

**Area:** 5-ft.-radius spherical emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 88

You are covered in a thin layer of white frost and frigid cold emanates from your body, dealing 1d6 points of cold damage at the start of your round to each creature within 5 feet.
